name: titan-nexus-command
description: Browser-based simultaneous turn-based multiplayer game set on Titan.

scripts.dev: npx -y concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.cleanup:git: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: clean git index' && git push origin main
